name: Social Recruiter
tag_list: staffing, recruiter, recruiting, jobs, candidate, resume, hiring
overview:
Social Recruiter is a social networking and research tool for recruiters, job seekers and companies looking to hire and choose the right staff. Social Search and Job Matching Technologies for a new generation of staffing needs.

What is Social Staffing? All recruiters know that each person own value is driven by the social capitol they have build by networking with companies and other industry professionals. Each connection has a value and he person within ones own circle can make or break the success of his client. In order to find the best candidate for a job.

Social Recruiter will enable individuals or multi person staffing companies to instantly start staffing in a moments notice. Multi-company commission and referral tracking with enable companies and individuals to work together to place the right candidates.
